body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Davis and the customer's name is Victoria Cox.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joe Davis, and I represent ABC Accounting Firm. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Joe, I'm Victoria Cox. I'm having some issues with my recent billing statement.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Victoria. I would be happy to help you with that. Could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Victoria. Can you also verify your phone number for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's six zero eight three four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that information. I can see your billing statement here. I understand you are feeling concerned about it?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I noticed an unexpected charge this month that I don't recognize.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Let me look into that for you. I'll get to the bottom of the charge and explain it.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Joe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Victoria! I appreciate your patience. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Victoria. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
